name: "Viewer Collage (Animated)" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [White crayon on black paper with digital embellishments, color, and mixed media digital collage. Animated using a free, online site.] I grew up loving View Masters, these plastic "3-D" stereoscopic viewer toys with the little, circular slide reels. I collected the viewers and reels for decades... (My favorite slide reels: "The Little Yellow Dinosaur," "Snoopy and the Red Baron," and "Battle Beyond the Stars!" Old school shit...) ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
